column1: #text=I needed to travel across the state , and the train was the quickest and most efficient way to do that as my car is unable to make a long trip .
#text=I went online to the Amtrak website and checked the schedule and prices , and then made a reservation .
#text=A friend gave me a lift to the depot and once there I purchased my ticket and then boarded the train when it arrived on time .
#text=I brought my small suitcase onboard with me and did not need to check any other bags .
#text=The train ride was comfortable and not crowded , so I had my own seat .
#text=There were no delays on the tracks and my carriage had only mature adults who were peaceful and quiet , so it was a pleasant and quiet journey .
#text=I visited the dining car to get a snack and though it was expensive it was well stocked , and I bought a coffee and a turkey sandwich .
#text=My arrival was on time and I disembarked .
